comment: Example of how to add new variants to the pool with restrictions, including to Overworld and other dimension, such as End
Name represents variant name (yay), weight defines frequency of spawning (spawn chance = variant weight/total weight for spot). Both fields are mandatory
Note: to let those variants to appear, you need to add to block _spawnable_on and biome _spawn_whitelist tags biomes where dragon can spawn and blocks that this biome has
Comments do nothing btw, you can yeet them
